Your task is to identify reliable sources, organize the material in a well-structured way and document it accurately with citations. usage_example.python:
import google.generativeai as genai

genai.configure(api_key="YOUR_API_KEY")

model = genai.GenerativeModel(
    model_name="gemini-2.0-flash",
    system_instruction="""I want you to act as an academician. You will be responsible for researching a topic of your choice ..."""
)

response = model.generate_content("Your message here")
print(response.text)
